item.title: DuneCrawl launches January 5, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Explore a hand-drawn world with friends aboard a gigantic crustacean.

Cooperative isometric action adventure game DuneCrawl will launch for PC via Steam on January 5, 2026, developer Alientrap announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Alientrap:

DuneCrawl is a one-to-four-player online and local cooperative action adventure game where players take on the roles of desert-faring privateers. Together, players explore the dust seas by piloting their Dune Crawler, a gigantic walking crustacean festooned with cannons and treasure maps.

Travel through sprawling, lush, hand-drawn environments to unfold the story surrounding the mystery of the Dune Crawlers. Interact with quest-giving NPCs, defend the local towns from bandits, discover hidden plunder, ride armored scarabs, and defend your title as the greatest freebooter this side of the seven sands.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/dunecrawl-launches-january-5-2026

item.title: KO_OP announces co-op narrative life simulation game Young Suns for Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Available now in Game Preview and via Game Pass.

Goodbye Volcano High developer KO_OP has announced one-to-four-player narrative life simulation game Young Suns. It is available now in Game Preview for Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Microsoft Store for $19.99, as well as via Game Pass. A Steam release will follow at a later date.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Young Suns is a one-to-four-player narrative life sim set on Jupiter, in an optimistic alternative future. Visit planetoids, ruins, and stations. Decorate and customize your own spaceship. Help the citizens of Jupiter make society better!

Be Yourself Among the Stars—Help Build a Future for Everyone

The people of Jupiter are newly free, and they’ve entrusted you with your very own ship. There’s a lot of work to be done, if we want to make this a better world! Visit planetoids, ruins, and stations with a crew of up to three friends, or entirely on your own. Take on quests from the friendly citizens of Jupiter. Decorate and customize your spaceship. Build relationships with a huge cast of lovable characters, and help rebuild and improve society, for everyone.

Key Features

  • 30 Fully Realized Characters – Each with unique looks, behaviors and over two months of unique daily chats. Learn their stories, and help with the many problems faced by the people of Jupiter.
  • Create Your Perfect Look – Alter any aspect of your look during play—character creation is only the beginning. Recolor clothing to match your style.
  • Your Ship is Your Home – Personalize your spaceship with 80+ discoverable recipes and items. Paint the walls, stack your shelves—create your ideal cozy nest among the stars.
  • That’s Not Junk, It’s Treasure! – Find and repair damaged furniture, clothing and tools. Use them yourself, gift them, or donate them to the common cause.
  • Grow and Thrive – Upgrade your tools to perform harder jobs. Improve and expand your ship.
  • Open World Exploration – Fly your ship to fantastical planetoids, derelict ruins, and converted space stations on your journey through a newly-reclaimed region of Jovian space.
  • One-to-Four-Player Cooperative Play – Seamless drop-in cooperative play. Keep your personal progression across sessions. Experience storylines together, or keep them for your own time.
  • Space is Beautiful – Featuring a dynamic fully-composed soundtrack, gorgeous colorful visuals, and deep, characterful writing.

Watch the announcement trailer and presentation below.

Announce Trailer

Announce Presentation



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/11/ko_op-announces-co-op-narrative-life-simulation-game-young-suns-for-xbox-series-xbox-one-and-pc
